BasicInfo.short: SearchForce is a software-based company that delivers a hosted platform to optimize PPC performance.

Products.name: SearchForce Synchronization
Products.description: Download or upload data at your convenience.

Products.name: SearchForce Device Targeting
Products.description: Target users on any device – desktop and mobile.

Products.name: SearchForce Retargeting
Products.description: A second chance at conversion. Retarget prospects with pinpoint precision.

Products.name: SearchForce Tracking
Products.description: You can’t track what you can’t measure.

Products.name: SearchForce Campaign Automation
Products.description: A solid framework of automation you just can’t find anywhere else.

Products.name: SearchForce Reporting & Analytics
Products.description: SearchForce offers a highly flexible reporting solution that allows for consolidation and customization .

Products.name: SearchForce Social
Products.description: Reach out to 1.1 billion people. But keep your campaign optimized for peak performance.

Products.name: SearchForce Attribution Manager
Products.description: SearchForce offers multi-click attribution models that assign weightings to multiple events throughout the purchase funnel.
